text: [Jusa'] Guft: «Ba jod dori, hangome ki [ʙaroi istirohat] ʙa kanori on taxtasang coj giriftem, man [dar on co dostoni zinda sudani] mohiro faromus kardam [ki ʙo tu ʙigujam] va cuz sajton [kase] maro az jodovarii on [doston] ʙa faromusi naandoxt va mohi ʙa tarze sigiftovar rohasro dar darjo pes girift»
